expected: -h, --help                      shows this help message and exits
-C <dir>                        runs as if cov was started in <dir> instead of the current working directory
--list-cmds <spec>[,<spec>,...] lists known commands from requested groups
init                            creates a new cov repo
config                          shows and/or sets various settings
report                          appends a report to repo
remove                          removes a particular report from repo
log                             prints a list of reports
serve                           starts a local webserver with reports
